00014 #ifndef CSPLINE_H_
00015 #define CSPLINE_H_
00016 
00017 #include "support.h"
00018 
00019 #include <map>
00020 #include <gsl/gsl_interp.h>
00021 #include <gsl/gsl_spline.h>
00022 
00023 //! Wrapper class for cubic (natural) spline approximation.
00024 class CSplineApprox
00025 {
00026 public:
00027     CSplineApprox(const std::map<double, double> &pts);
00028     ~CSplineApprox();
00029     //! Do spline approx.
00030     double approx(double x) const;
00031 private:
00032     gsl_interp_accel *m_accel;
00033     gsl_spline *m_spline;
00034 };
00035 
00036 #endif /*CSPLINE_H_*/
